metadata.title: CVE-2017-16876 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the _keyify function inmistune.py in Mistune before 0.8.1 allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML by leveraging failure to escape the "key"argument.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-16876` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-mistune - 0.8.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mistune package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.1-1').
